title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends               The Friends of Independence Park is a non-profit organization that supports the park's education and preservation goals. By joining The Friends of Independence Park, you, too, can become a park partner. Help protect our nation's heritage of liberty and democracy, and ensure that the voice of freedom continues to inspire visitors of all ages from across America and around the world. td>
